comment: i really wish i could say i enjoyed this class. she is nice at best. every assignment was extremely unclear in requirements. she struggled to use d2l and we couldn't even submit anything until midway thru the semester. talked SO much for no reason, we couldn't even get anything done during our six hour long class. did not teach, just talked.

disorganized and confusing with lectures. doesnt show drawing examples, talks TOO much,will treat you like a child (no hats/hoods, phones in class, ask permission to use restroom, doesnt let you leave class early even for emergencies,etc). Doesnt know how to use D2l,confusing assignments and grading, doesnt use rubric/grade consistently, AVOID
If you can avoid taking this professor for painting one... please do. Incredibly disorganized! A lot of assignment due dates were pushed around, details and grading criteria were incredibly unclear.
